a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Life expectancy vs. GDP per capita, 1543 to 2018
The period life expectancy at birth, in a given year. GDP per capita is adjusted for inflation and differences in the
Data source: UN WPP (2022); HMD (2023); Zijdeman et al. (2015); Riley (2005); Maddison Project Database (2020)
Note: GDP per capita is expressed in international-$ at 2011 prices.
